description: Creates a new Outposts bucket. By creating the bucket, you become the bucket owner. To create an Outposts bucket, you must have S3 on Outposts. For more information, see Using Amazon S3 on Outposts in Amazon S3 User Guide. Not every string is an acceptable bucket name. For information on bucket naming restrictions, see Working with Amazon S3 Buckets. S3 on Outposts buckets support: For a complete list of restrictions and Amazon S3 feature limitations on S3 on Outposts, see Amazon S3 on Outposts Restrictions and Limitations. For an example of the request syntax for Amazon S3 on Outposts that uses the S3 on Outposts endpoint hostname prefix and x-amz-outpost-id in your API request, see the Examples section. The following actions are related to CreateBucket for Amazon S3 on Outposts:

parameters.name: ACL
parameters.description: The canned ACL to apply to the bucket.

parameters.name: CreateBucketConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration information for the bucket. LocationConstraint (string) --- Specifies the Region where the bucket will be created. If you are creating a bucket on the US East (N. Virginia) Region (us-east-1), you do not need to specify the location.

nested_params.name: LocationConstraint
nested_params.description: Specifies the Region where the bucket will be created. If you are creating a bucket on the US East (N. Virginia) Region (us-east-1), you do not need to specify the location.

parameters.name: GrantFullControl
parameters.description: Allows grantee the read, write, read ACP, and write ACP permissions on the bucket.

parameters.name: GrantRead
parameters.description: Allows grantee to list the objects in the bucket.

parameters.name: GrantReadACP
parameters.description: Allows grantee to read the bucket ACL.

parameters.name: GrantWrite
parameters.description: Allows grantee to create, overwrite, and delete any object in the bucket.

parameters.name: GrantWriteACP
parameters.description: Allows grantee to write the ACL for the applicable bucket.

parameters.name: ObjectLockEnabledForBucket
parameters.description: Specifies whether you want S3 Object Lock to be enabled for the new bucket.

parameters.name: OutpostId
parameters.description: The ID of the Outposts where the bucket is being created.

nested_items.name: BucketArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bucket.
